alternative_parents.description: S-ester derivatives of dithiophosphates, with the general structure RSP(O)(O)=S (R = organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Dithiophosphate S-esters

alternative_parents.description: O-ester derivatives of dithiophosphates, with the general structure RSP(O)(O)=S (R = organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Dithiophosphate O-esters

alternative_parents.description: Carboxylic acid amides in which the two acyl groups linked to the central nitrogen atoms are carboacyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dicarboximides

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic derivatives of thiophosphonic acid, thiophosphoric acid, dithiophosphoric acid, or phosphorotrithioic acid, or derivatives thereof. Thiophosphonic acid, dithiophosphoric acid, thiophosphoric acid, and phosphorotrithioic acid are thiophosphorus compounds with the formula OP(O)(=S), OP(S)(=S)O, OP(O)(=S)O, and OP(=S)(S)S, respectively.
alternative_parents.name: Organothiophosphorus compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organonitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

class.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH or a derivative thereof.
class.name: Carboxylic acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as n-substituted carboxylic acid imides. These are compounds comprising an N-substituted carboxylic acid imide group, with the general structure R1N(C(R2)=O)C(R3)=O (R2,R3=H, alkyl, aryl; R1=Anything but H).

direct_parent.description: Compounds comprising an N-substituted carboxylic acid imide group, with the general structure R1N(C(R2)=O)C(R3)=O (R2,R3=H, alkyl, aryl; R1=Anything but H).
direct_parent.name: N-substituted carboxylic acid imides

intermediate_nodes.description: Carboxylic acid derivatives containing two carbonyl groups where the carbon atoms are both linked to the same nitrogen atom.
intermediate_nodes.name: Carboxylic acid imides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
